Text: Thank you, @MayorBibb for your kind words. Let us continue to work and fight on behalf of the great people of OH-11! https://t.co/c5cTzpJC62

I am extremely honored to receive an endorsement from the 58th Mayor of Cleveland, Ohio, @MayorBibb! I look forward to continuing our work in advancing the need of the constituents of the 11th Congressional District! https://t.co/39kRBZpzd1

The first-ever #NBAAllStar HBCU classic between @morganstate_mbb and @HowardU was simply amazing! HBCUs provide pathways to future success and they are needed more than ever! Thank you @NBA for spotlighting their importance. I loved seeing @hureslIfecourt and both bands! https://t.co/aiXtfhBava

Sport & social justice. This #NBAAllstar weekend is highlighting the power of sport to impact real change. I appreciate sharing the stage with these leaders and speaking about the Ali #Clevelandsummit impact on social issues, reform, and growth at the @clesportsummit https://t.co/4e8xn1G7YB
The performances will be streamed on the @ECPLtweets & @twinsburglib websites and social media. Learn more by reading this article! https://t.co/86MPWlcY99

Local contributions bring #BlackHistoryMonth closer and makes it more tangible for all of us! The BLAX Museum, a local, annual performance showcase dedicated to honoring African American accomplishments was featured in today's @clevelanddotcom /Plain Dealer.

Team, guess what? Today marks Congresswoman Shontel Brown's 100th day in office! As a guardian for its democratic values and the vessel for its people’s voices, Shontel Brown has accomplished much for Ohio. https://t.co/NiXxRloHVd

I am honored to have the support of the @ohioaflcio! I will continue to stand beside American workers to fight for fair wages, job security, and advanced training opportunities. The fight for American workers never ends, and I look forward to continuing the work in Washington. https://t.co/TrN845GvCT

I am proud to stand with my colleagues to extend my reach to support LGBTQ+ people abroad as a member of Congress. #GlobalRespectAct https://t.co/eOAxk7lyvq
Since serving on Cuyahoga County Council, I have co-sponsored and supported legislation to address disparities and acts of inhumanity against the LGBTQ+ community.

I supported the #bipartisaninfrastructurelaw for many reasons, including the unprecedented amount of funding soon-to-be invested in Ohio's public transit for better jobs, access, and opportunity for the millions of users in NEO. https://t.co/ZS3gN47i79

Late last month, I proudly joined other local leaders for a virtual groundbreaking for Sherwin-Williams new global HQ in #Cleveland. Sherwin Williams employs more 4,500+ workers in Cuyahoga. They are a key partner in our economy. https://t.co/1dGe1ND3PM https://t.co/D8ML3vXLwW

This investment in our people, along with the recently announced $67 million public-private partnership with @LeadSafeCLE, @CityofCleveland, @CleCityCouncil, @ClevelandClinic, @UnitedWayCLE has the potential to dramatically improve our community's health.

Lead exposure - it's a public health emergency we must overcome. I'm proud to have supported the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law, which provides Ohio with $71 million to remove lead pipes from our homes and improve access to safe drinking water.
Positive COVID-19 cases are dropping in northeast Ohio, but we are still in a pandemic. Remember, you can order 4 free at-home tests at https://t.co/C5wYwR3BDL

Now that's a HUGE sign @ohioafcio! I am proud to have supported bringing hundreds of thousands of jobs to Ohio to upgrade our roads and bridges, replace lead pipe, and improve Hopkins airport. I'm fighting every day for the people of the 11th district and Ohio! https://t.co/1bnlmUGUGX
I wish a happy #LunarNewYear to those who observe this special day! May your year be filled with happiness, growth, and prosperity! https://t.co/8ZHDjh6Zsw

The role African Americans carried out in the building of our nation cannot be denied! Black history is American history. We have a lot going on to celebrate #BlackHistoryMonth here in the 11th district. Our friends at @Cleveland_PL share a few. Learn more https://t.co/Y4o19yvLCc

I appeared on @MSNBC's Weekend with @AlexWitt on Sunday to discuss child tax credits which helped 70,000 households in the 11th Congressional District, the fight for fair districts here in Ohio, and what I'm doing to fight for all of us. Watch below! https://t.co/luOqukaF2r
On this #HolocaustRemembranceDay, we pay tribute to the millions of innocent European Jews killed by Nazi Germany. Together we mourn this atrocity and vow to #NeverForget. https://t.co/RL8BvMFxPL

This morning, Rep. Brown was joined by local officials & labor leaders to announce the new $96M  investment in OH bridges. The bridges on Martin Luther King Dr. & many others across the area will benefit from this critical funding provided by the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law.

"Ironic that the Congresswoman is here today talking about bridges. She's spent her career building bridges among people." - David Wondolowski, Cleveland Building and Construction Trades Council Executive Secretary. https://t.co/kdguTqO6cH

I am committed to working with Democrats in Washington and will do everything in my power to make ‘Build Back Better’ possible.

I am thankful for the support of President Biden. The President's agenda will bring economic relief and quality health care to all Americans. I have always been a unifying leader, willing to roll up my sleeves to get the job done.
"I am proud to endorse Shontel Brown for Ohio’s 11th District in the U.S. House of Representatives.” - President Joe Biden (3/3)

"Shontel’s experience as a Cuyahoga County Council member will be critical as we beat the pandemic and make transformational investments to build our economy back better around working people and the middle class..." (2/3)
